instructions: Susendeep Dutta November 16, 2011 at 1:53 pm Check whether your inbox is full. Have you tried restarting iPhone? If the above steps doesn't works then - 1.Check airplane mode is turned off. 2.Try resetting your network settings by going to Settings --> General --> Reset, then scroll down and tap Reset Network Settings.(Warning:It will clear all your cellular, Wi-Fi,VPN setting,passwords). 3.Reinsert the SIM card by gently pushing the SIM slot present on the right side and reinsert it. 4.Connect your iPhone to iTunes and make sure iTunes is updated.Sync iPhone with iTunes to back up your most recent data and settings. 5.Restore iPhone.
